scripts.build: for f in circuits/main/*; do if [ -d "$f" ]; then (cd "$f" && nargo compile && nargo build); fi; done
scripts.export: for f in circuits/main/*; do if [ -d "$f" ]; then (cd "$f" && bb write_vk -t evm -s ultra_honk -b ./target/$(basename "$f").json -o ./target && bb write_solidity_verifier -t evm -s ultra_honk -k ./target/vk -o ./target/verifier.sol --optimized); fi; done
scripts.export-app: mkdir -p ../webapp/artifacts/circuits && for f in circuits/main/*; do if [ -d "$f" ]; then (cd "$f" && cp ./target/$(basename "$f").json ../../../../webapp/artifacts/circuits/$(basename "$f").json); fi; done
